card_name: A Tale of the Boastful Sailor
special_text:
Audition for blue. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
